description.value: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial] as a 5th-level divine innate spell, but the celestial summoned must be from the same category as your own lineage, such as a creature with the angel trait if you are angelkin.
